enumeratedValues.name: mask_wdog_rst_5
enumeratedValues.description: wdog_rst_b is masked

enumeratedValues.name: mask_wdog_rst_10
enumeratedValues.description: wdog_rst_b is not masked (default)

enumeratedValues.name: core0_rst_0
enumeratedValues.description: do not assert core0 reset

enumeratedValues.name: core0_rst_1
enumeratedValues.description: assert core0 reset

core0_dbg_rst.name: core0_dbg_rst
core0_dbg_rst.description: Software reset for core0 debug only

enumeratedValues.name: core0_dbg_rst_0
enumeratedValues.description: do not assert core0 debug reset

enumeratedValues.name: core0_dbg_rst_1
enumeratedValues.description: assert core0 debug reset

dbg_rst_msk_pg.name: dbg_rst_msk_pg
dbg_rst_msk_pg.description: Do not assert debug resets after power gating event of core

enumeratedValues.name: dbg_rst_msk_pg_0
enumeratedValues.description: do not mask core debug resets (debug resets will be asserted after power gating event)

enumeratedValues.name: dbg_rst_msk_pg_1
enumeratedValues.description: mask core debug resets (debug resets won't be asserted after power gating event)

enumeratedValues.name: mask_wdog3_rst_5
enumeratedValues.description: wdog3_rst_b is masked

enumeratedValues.name: mask_wdog3_rst_10
enumeratedValues.description: wdog3_rst_b is not masked

ipp_reset_b.name: ipp_reset_b
ipp_reset_b.description: Indicates whether reset was the result of ipp_reset_b pin (Power-up sequence)

enumeratedValues.name: ipp_reset_b_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not a result of ipp_reset_b pin.

enumeratedValues.name: ipp_reset_b_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is a result of ipp_reset_b pin.

lockup_sysresetreq.name: lockup_sysresetreq
lockup_sysresetreq.description: Indicates a reset has been caused by CPU lockup or software setting of SYSRESETREQ bit in Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register of the Arm core

enumeratedValues.name: lockup_sysresetreq_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not a result of the mentioned case.

enumeratedValues.name: lockup_sysresetreq_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is a result of the mentioned case.

csu_reset_b.name: csu_reset_b
csu_reset_b.description: Indicates whether the reset was the result of the csu_reset_b input.

enumeratedValues.name: csu_reset_b_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not a result of the csu_reset_b event.

enumeratedValues.name: csu_reset_b_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is a result of the csu_reset_b event.

ipp_user_reset_b.name: ipp_user_reset_b
ipp_user_reset_b.description: Indicates whether the reset was the result of the ipp_user_reset_b qualified reset.

enumeratedValues.name: ipp_user_reset_b_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not a result of the ipp_user_reset_b qualified as COLD reset event.

enumeratedValues.name: ipp_user_reset_b_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is a result of the ipp_user_reset_b qualified as COLD reset event.

enumeratedValues.name: wdog_rst_b_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not a result of the watchdog time-out event.

enumeratedValues.name: wdog_rst_b_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is a result of the watchdog time-out event.

jtag_rst_b.name: jtag_rst_b
jtag_rst_b.description: HIGH - Z JTAG reset. Indicates whether the reset was the result of HIGH-Z reset from JTAG.

enumeratedValues.name: jtag_rst_b_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not a result of HIGH-Z reset from JTAG.

enumeratedValues.name: jtag_rst_b_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is a result of HIGH-Z reset from JTAG.

jtag_sw_rst.name: jtag_sw_rst
jtag_sw_rst.description: JTAG software reset. Indicates whether the reset was the result of software reset from JTAG.

enumeratedValues.name: jtag_sw_rst_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not a result of the mentioned case.

enumeratedValues.name: jtag_sw_rst_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is a result of the mentioned case.

enumeratedValues.name: wdog3_rst_b_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not a result of the watchdog3 time-out event.

enumeratedValues.name: wdog3_rst_b_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is a result of the watchdog3 time-out event.

enumeratedValues.name: tempsense_rst_b_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not a result of software reset from Temperature Sensor.

enumeratedValues.name: tempsense_rst_b_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is a result of software reset from Temperature Sensor.

SEC_CONFIG.name: SEC_CONFIG
SEC_CONFIG.description: SECONFIG[1] shows the state of the SECONFIG[1] fuse

BT_FUSE_SEL.name: BT_FUSE_SEL
BT_FUSE_SEL.description: BT_FUSE_SEL (connected to gpio bt_fuse_sel) shows the state of the BT_FUSE_SEL fuse

BMOD.name: BMOD
BMOD.description: BMOD[1:0] shows the latched state of the BOOT_MODE1 and BOOT_MODE0 signals on the rising edge of POR_B

PERSISTENT_ENTRY0.name: PERSISTENT_ENTRY0
PERSISTENT_ENTRY0.description: Holds entry function for core0 for waking-up from low power mode

PERSISTENT_ARG0.name: PERSISTENT_ARG0
PERSISTENT_ARG0.description: Holds argument of entry function for core0 for waking-up from low power mode

PERSIST_REDUNDANT_BOOT.name: PERSIST_REDUNDANT_BOOT
PERSIST_REDUNDANT_BOOT.description: This field identifies which image must be used - 0/1/2/3

PERSIST_SECONDARY_BOOT.name: PERSIST_SECONDARY_BOOT
PERSIST_SECONDARY_BOOT.description: This bit identifies which image must be used - primary and secondary
